#summary Install Lusca on pfsense.
= Introduction =
Lusca r14371 patch r08. Patches applied:
  # store-stale, ignore-must-revalidate
  # vary aware using storeurl
  # redirect loop using storeurl
  # save vary object other than COSS (vary index will lost on rebuild)
=== Instruction ===
  # Install pfsense's squid package first.
  # Run this in console
{{{
fetch http://pfsense-cacheboy.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/script/lusca.sh && chmod +x lusca.sh && ./lusca.sh
}}}
*Notes*<br>
Configurations at:<br>
/usr/local/etc/squid/dir.conf - _cache directory, web GUI cache_dir will not be used for now. Use this instead_<br>
/usr/local/etc/squid/include.conf - _other squid configurations_<br>
/usr/local/etc/squid/refresh.conf - _refresh patterns_<br>
